        <h1>Thailand - Japan Student ICT Fair 2016 (TJ-SIF2016)</h1>
        <h2>21st - 23rd December 2016</h2>
        <h3>At Princess Chulabhorn Science High School Chonburi</h3>
        <p>Following last year’s Thailand - Japan Student Science Fair 2015 (TJ-SSF 2015) that was held at PCSHS Phetchaburi to mark the end of the festival assuring a deeper understanding of science and a close friendship among youth between Thailand and Japan, and now the time has come!<br /><br />In this year, The second Thailand-Japan Student Science Fair is again organized with emphasize on student science projects on Information and Communication Technology (ICT). The topics cover software, hardware, applications, the Internet of Thing (IoT) and/or robotics.<br /><br />
The 2016 Science Fair is called "Thailand-Japan Student ICT Fair 2016 (TJ-SIF2016)" and held at Princess Chulabhorn Science School Chonburi (PCSH School Chonburi) on 21-23 December 2016.<br /><br />
Hope to see everyone ready to learn and have fun!
        </p>
        <h3>Cooperation with:</h3>
        <div class="row">
          <div class="col-xs-10 col-md-9">
            <h3>Japan International Cooperation Agency (JICA)</h3>
          </div>
          <div class="col-xs-2 col-md-2">
            <img src="img/jica-logo.png" alt="JICA Logo" class="center-block">
          </div>
        </div><!-- /.row -->
        <div class="row">
          <div class="col-xs-10 col-md-9">
            <h3>King Mongkut's Institute of Technology Ladkrabang (KMITL)</h3>
          </div>
          <div class="col-xs-2 col-md-2">
            <img src="img/kmitl-logo.png" alt="KMITL Logo" class="center-block">
          </div>
        </div><!-- /.row -->
      </div><!-- /.container -->
    </section>

    <section id="pcshs" class="pcshs">
      <div class="container">
        <h2>12 Princess Chulabhorn Science High School</h2>
        <p>Twelve Princess Chulabhorn Science High Schools (PCSH Schools) were established in 1993 in 12 regions around Thailand to celebrate the 36th birthday of Her Royal Highness Princess Chulabhorn. HRF has been a lecturer in Chemistry at Mahidol University and a member of the President's Council of the University of Tokyo.<br /><br />PCSH School has both junior high school (grade 7 to 9) and senior high school (grade 10 to 12). Only students with excellent academic records are qualified to apply for PCSH school.<br /><br />PCSH Schools have developed cooperation with Super Science High School (SSH Schools) of Japan.</p>
        <div class="container">
          <img src="img/12CSHS.jpg" alt="12 PCSHS" class="img-responsive center-block">
        </div>
      </div>
    </section>
    
    <section id="ssh" class="ssh">
      <div class="container">
        <h2>Super Science High School</h2>
        <p>Super Science High Schools (SSH Schools) are senior high schools that prioritize science, technology and mathematics and in so doing that receive the SSH designation awarded by the Japanese Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology (MEXT). The program was launched as part of its “Science Literacy Enhancement Initiatives” in 2002. <br /><br />SSH schools with this status receive increased funding and are encouraged to develop links with universities and other academic institutions. Selected high schools are expected to develop curricula based on science and mathematics in cooperation with universities or research institutes.<br /><br />In 2002, the first year of operation, 26 out of 77 applicant schools were awarded SSH status. As of the 2006 Academic year there are 201 schools with the designation.</p>
        <div class="container">

        </div>
      </div>
    </section>

            <h4 class="modal-title" id="myModalLabel">Warning devices Forgot your children or pets in the car with the board arduino</h4>
            <h5 class="modal-title" id="myModalLabe1">Princess Chulabhorn Science High School Lopburi</h5>
          </div>
          <div class="modal-body">
            <h4>Group:</h4>Hardware
            <h4>Concept:</h4>We use camera trapping heat waves to scan for heat waves of creatures trapped in the car to work is if the camera captures heat wave. Suddenly, the scan showed a heat wave transmitter sms text message is sent to the vehicle owner. It will be sent a warning and a shake of the phone's unique identity. And this message will be sent every 5 or 10 minutes, etc. It would be beneficial for various aspects such as transport schoolchildren, parents of a child or pet (family car) and passenger vans.
            <h4>Objective:</h4>1. To reduce the problem of stranded children on school buses / passengers. Which is why it may make children / passenger. Died from lack of oxygen<br />2. To reduce the problem of stranded pets. (Endothermic), which may cause the pet. (Endothermic) died from lack of oxygen.<br />3. To develop a prototype of this innovation for the next time.

            <h4 class="modal-title" id="myModalLabel">The Collect Waste Robot</h4>
            <h5 class="modal-title" id="myModalLabe1">Princess Chulabhorn Science High School Phathumthani</h5>
          </div>
          <div class="modal-body">
            <h4>Group:</h4>Robotics
            <h4>Concept:</h4>Nowadays, the pollution problem in Thailand are increase and make many trouble to each people. They are having bad quality of life which effect from pollution in city and countryside. The important problem about pollution is from waste in household.<br />From Pollution Control Department of Thailand (PCD) have a waste situation until 2008 - 2014. Many waste from each  village are happen 26.19 million tons in 2014. There are from Bangkok 15% and other province 85%. Top 5 provinces where happen many waste in Thailand namely are Bangkok (10,800 tons per day), Chonburi (2,398 tons per day), Nakhon Rajasima (2,264 tons per day), Samutprakarn (2,025 tons per day) and Khon kean (1,829 tons per day). The average waste develop ratio is 1.11 kilograms each people.<br />However, there are over abundantly to eradicate. 53% of all are eradicate with correct process. For example, recycle, burn and etc. There is effect from sort out type of waste before put it in a bin that make eradicate process is slow down. So, Project inventor have idea for collect and sort out type of waste before eradicate with robot. It can help to collect and sort out type of waste to easy and save time.
            <h4>Objective:</h4>For create a new robot that can collect rubbish. Namely, plastic, paper and metal.
            <h4>Students' names:</h4>1. Mr. Nattapak Darumas<br />2. Ms. impika Hongsawadee
            <h4>Teachers' names:</h4>1. Ms. Yupaporn Limsanguan

The landscapes of the school where there are a lot of dinosaurs in the original’s actual size will be just like Jurassic Park!

            <h4 class="modal-title" id="myModalLabel">EVO ‘Through the dimensions’</h4>
            <h5 class="modal-title" id="myModalLabe1">Princess Chulabhorn Science High School Trang</h5>
          </div>
          <div class="modal-body">
            <h4>Group:</h4>Applications
            <h4>Concept:</h4>This project is about making game on the Android system. The storyboard will include the content of Biology by using our main character ,whose name is EVO, to lead the players. The players will play as EVO and they will meet so many types of ancient animals. In another way, each player could fight with some of dangerous animals and then the player will gain the detail from that animals. Another option in this game is the map. The players can choose where they want to start their new game so there would be different types of animals in the different landscapes.
